alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 10:23AM PST until December 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except up to 6 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph along ridge lines. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be very difficult and slow going today. Gusty winds could cause damage to trees and lead to power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Check with Caltrans and Nevada DOT for updates to road conditions.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
